item.title: Food
item.dc:creator: @pk2play pk2play
item.description:
@pk2play wrote:

[quote=“Forsakinpkers, post:1, topic:416096”] if (playerCommand.equals("food")) { c.getItems().addItem(385, 28); c.sendMessage("<shad=10906535>Donate to get RockTails!"); }

how do i make this command not give food in the wildy?[/quote]

if (playerCommand.equals("food")) { if (c.inWild()) { return; } c.getItems().addItem(385, 28); c.sendMessage("<shad=10906535>Donate to get RockTails!"); }
